name: Grilled Margherita® Pepperoni on Focaccia with Sun-Dried Tomato Olio
author: Margherita Meats
summary: Toasty focaccia topped with crisp Margherita® Pepperoni slices, melted Provolone cheese and fresh arugula, all drizzled with a rich sun-dried tomato olio.
ingredients: 4  focaccia rolls (3.5 oz. each), sliced in half
directions: For the sun-dried tomato olio: Combine the sun-dried tomato pesto, mayonnaise, and olive oil in a small bowl
In medium saucepan, fry Margherita® Pepperoni over low heat for 1 to 2 minutes on each side, or until edges begin to curl
Toast or grill sliced focaccia until crispy
Layer pepperoni and cheese on the bottom slices of focaccia bread, distributing evenly among the 4 sandwiches
For melted cheese, place built sandwich bottoms on baking sheet
Bake at 225 degrees for 3 to 5 minutes or until cheese melts
Add sun-dried tomato olio, top with baby arugula, close with top half of bread
